document_data.name: Jalasta Kelelder
document_data.mainbody: '''Jalasta Kelelder''' was a skilled [[warrior]] inhabiting [[Suldolphor]] in the far eastern reaches of [[Calimshan]] in [[south Faerûn]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: She was middle-aged as of the {{YearlinkName|1367}}.
document_data.Activities: Jalasta was one of two High Swords who led the [[Flame Guard]]–an elite group of warriors who protected Suldolphor's ruling [[olanger]].
document_data.History: She earned her stripes serving as a mercenary for many years in [[Tethyr]] and beyond.
document_data.Possessions: Jalasta wore and enchanted suit of [[armor]] and wielded a ''[[flame tongue]]'' [[sword]].
